Text: Shouldn't this be in music rather than audio books???

I gotta say, whoever edited the tracks did one hell of a job. You see, a track ends in the very instant when a particular song ends, so the next track contains all the crowd noise and band banter and each song actually begins between 30 seconds and a minute into the track.

For example, they actually start playing Universally Speaking at 1:58 of the track named Universally Speaking. The same track ends in the same instant when the song ends, etc.

Bom, pra falar a verdade as musicas estão fora do padrão não por minha causa, eu baixei de um BLOG e postei no TPB disponibilizando via TORRENT, desde de já peço desculpas, tenho um cd normal porem esta baixo o audio e irei deixar esse mesmo
Ok then, thanks for your upload!
